SELECT vehicle.id AS id, user_id AS userId, brand.brand_name AS brandName, model.model_name AS modelName, location_id AS locationId, used_hours AS usedHours, vehicle_age AS vehicleAge, equipment_number AS equipmentNumber, description, contact, contact_phone AS contactPhone, tonnage, sell AS isSell, rent AS isRent, sell_state AS sellState, rent_state AS rentState, sell_price AS sellPrice, rent_price AS rentPrice, release_date AS releaseDate, update_date AS updateDate FROM vehicle LEFT JOIN model ON vehicle.model_id = model.id LEFT JOIN brand ON vehicle.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN location ON vehicle.location_id = location.id WHERE vehicle.brand_id = #{brand} AND vehicle.model_id = #{model} AND vehicle.location_id = #{city}
AND vehicle.sell = 1 AND vehicle.sell_state = 0
AND vehicle.rent = 1 AND vehicle.rent_state = 0
AND ((brand.brand_name LIKE %#{keyword}%) OR (model.model_name LIKE %#{keyword}%) OR (vehicle.description LIKE %#{keyword}%))
LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
ORDER BY sell_price ASC ORDER BY rent_price ASC
ORDER BY sell_price DESC ORDER BY rent_price DESC
ORDER BY used_hours ASC
ORDER BY vehicle_age ASC
